entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Chilliwack
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:05 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Freezing rain at times heavy or rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Freezing rain at times heavy changing to rain at times heavy near noon. Rainfall amount 30 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
